title: Any Rioters?
body:
So I wanted to play a ranked game and it showed me a bug (something about my internet connection), I restarted my client, didn't worked, I restarted my PC and my team remaked... I do not have a problem that from 31 lp I have 14 lp but it showed something in the chat "You are not eligible to earn rewards for AFK behavior"
.... Well played Rito, I never went afk because I rage quited, and this time was the first time I was the fault of a remake and I get this message?
Edit 1: I'm curious if the "not eligible to earn rewards" is for hextech rewards or the final of the season rewards

replies.body:
The "ineligible" message you received only means you could not receive hextech loot for that one match, not all matches. 

If you have any other instances where you disconnect from a match, please let me know. I hope this cleared up the confusion.
Thank you very much, i was really scared that i would not receive the season rewards. But i have one more question, when we will receive the riot kayle and the icon?
I read the article better and i saw that we will get the 10 year gift in some days
